en: Fire a projectile of arcane energy at the target with a high chance of success.
Set the target ablaze doing high damage over time.
Encase the target in ice slowing it down and possibly restricting its movement.
Blind the target with a bright flash of light.
Heal the target for a small amount of health or instead remove all bleeding and poison effects if the target is bleeding or poisoned.
Blast the target with ambient sand or dust doing variable damage and possibly blinding the target.
Entangle the target in poisonous vines, pinning it down.
Errect a shield that absorbs all incomming damage up to a certain limit.
Conjure a gust of wind clearing fog or similar area effects and possibly affecting flying targets.
